content: Hello Mister Heine! It's great to finally meet you. I'm really excited about the opportunity to rent the apartment. Could you tell me more about the rental price?
name: Mary Smith

content:
Yes, of course. Let's start with the minimum rental price. What do you have in mind?

I have a minimum rental price of 800 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for sharing the minimum rental price. I'm sorry to say that I wouldn't be able to agree to that amount. I'm currently a student and I'm looking for an affordable option, so I would prefer a lower rental price if possible. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Mary Smith

content:
Yes, of course. What would you be willing to pay for the apartment?

I'm willing to pay up to 600 Euros per month. I would be happy to discuss any additional costs or benefits that could be included in the rental price, such as utilities or maintenance.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for sharing your budget. I understand that you're looking for an affordable option, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In that case, I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month. This includes all utilities and maintenance costs, so you won't have to worry about any additional expenses. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for the apartment, and I hope we can come to an agreement. What do you think?
name: Mary Smith
